title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example by default,
2. Create a new basic project,
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml',
4. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content,
5. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml',
6. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor',
7. Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example is reactivated,
8. Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types.
EB:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example by default,
2. Create a new basic project,
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml',
4. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content,
5. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml',
6. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor',
7. A new editor should open on the file, because the editor type is different.
